titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to annually designate at least one city in the United States as an "American World War II Heritage City", and for other purposes.
A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to annually designate at least one city in the United States as an "American World War II Heritage City", and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

term.name: Urban and suburban affairs and development
